name: Flat Terrestials Battle
description:
Flat Terrestials Battles is a game that lets you play with 2, 4, 8, 24, 100 (!?!?) players, with just a phone for every individual. You are assigned to a team or another and your goal is to not fall from earth, since is plane! HA! Check that globe earthers.

We use a plugin called "happyfuntimes" that let us connect multiple devices to the game, so, like that. you'll just need to go to this website for loading your gamepad controlers in your phone and start playing with other people! http://happyfuntimes.net/

This game was made for #Malagajam10
